languages.text: 指揮の声の効果を持つ{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}と味方は、この戦闘でまだ行動していない敵に追加で＋{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} and allies with the voice of command effect deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies that have not yet acted this combat.

traits.locale_text: 指揮の声の効果を持つ{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}と味方は、この戦闘でまだ行動していない敵に追加で＋{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

戦闘開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得る（{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は半分）。この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、オフィサー{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のみ使用できる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}与所有受到“指挥之声”影响的盟友，攻击尚未在本场战斗中行动过的敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}%。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} and allies with the voice of command effect deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies that have not yet acted this combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}与所有受到“指挥之声”影响的盟友，攻击尚未在本场战斗中行动过的敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}%。

战斗开始时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，军官的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}减半，且只能使用军官{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} y los aliados bajo los efectos de Voz de mando infligen +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a enemigos que no hayan actuado en este combate.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} and allies with the voice of command effect deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies that have not yet acted this combat.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} y los aliados bajo los efectos de Voz de mando infligen +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a enemigos que no hayan actuado en este combate.

Al principio del combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} obtiene un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con la mitad de sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, solo puede usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} de oficial.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} und mit dem Effekt "Stimme des Kommandos" belegte Verbündete fügen Gegnern, die in diesem Kampf noch nicht agiert haben, +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1} % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} and allies with the voice of command effect deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies that have not yet acted this combat.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} und mit dem Effekt "Stimme des Kommandos" belegte Verbündete Fügen Gegnern, die in diesem Kampf noch nicht agiert haben, zusätzliche +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} et ses alliés sous l'effet de Voix du commandement infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires aux ennemis qui n'ont pas encore pris une part active au combat.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} and allies with the voice of command effect deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies that have not yet acted this combat.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} et tout allié sous l'effet Voix du Commandement infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires aux ennemis qui n'ont pas encore agi au cours de ce combat.

L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} et tout allié sous l'effet Voix du Commandement infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires aux ennemis qui n'ont pas encore agi au cours de ce combat.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} и его союзники, на которых действует эффект "приказ командира", наносят +{uip|DamageBonus|58073019ae10412e9509b6ac97006bf1}% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} врагам, которые еще не успели сделать ни одного хода в этом бою.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} they can only use Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя лидер получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого можно использовать только {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} этой доктрины.
В начале боя лидер получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого можно использовать только {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} этой доктрины.
